name: Avian Vault Clamber
description:
Made in 7 Days for the 7 Day Rogue-like jam.

You have been dragged to the kingdoms deepest dungeon, can you aid your avian friend in his escape.

Featuring a cast of Baddies, A talkative protagonist, various accurately named weapons and music references.

Testimonials

"dis dunjen is cleerly a beeg lark" - John MacBird

"moi ex woife left me with the alimoney and child support" - Alex Alexander Avian

"please stop following me or I'll file a restraining order" - Some Guy
